rows.label: campfev11_080_100_msg0002
rows.name:
This is the work
of the Heaven's Holy Grail...

rows.label: campfev11_080_100_msg0004
rows.name:
I hope we can meet up with Kasumi.
I'm worried about her, too.

rows.label: campfev11_080_100_msg0006
rows.name:
But all we can do
is have faith.

rows.label: campfev11_080_100_msg0008
rows.name:
First things first,
we have to take that thing down.

rows.label: campfev11_080_100_msg0009
rows.name:
Right.
Then we'll wait
for Kasumi at Felt Village.
